sentences.sentence: Rising incomes allow Latinos to treat mutts as members of the family.
sentences.translation: 收入的增加让拉美人可以把狗狗宠为家庭的一员。

sentences.sentence: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts!
sentences.translation: 我预见不了你和你的那群狐朋狗友！

sentences.sentence: It's become a craze among dog owners in the states-getting together and throwing your mutts a pupperware party.
sentences.translation: 在美国的养狗者中已经形成一种热潮，他们聚在一起给狗狗们举办狗用品派对。
